main event: A civilian witness observed a cone-shaped light extending downward, like a comet with a tail, that appeared to be several hundred feet high and was blinking alternately red and white. The object hovered and then moved rapidly over the horizon.
interesting points: The object appeared to be stationary at first, then moved at a high rate of speed over the horizon.
The witness described the size of the light at the center as about the size of a pea.
The object came down to around 300 feet above the witness before moving away.
The report mentions that no such aircraft could be found in the area during the investigation.
The weather conditions at the time included broken clouds and bright noon conditions.
sighted object: a cone-shaped light with a tail, blinking alternately red and white
location: 3 miles south of Exit #33, south of the Florida State Turnpike
